definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-37" y="-8"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Toxicologist</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage" inline="false"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">INDIRECT_MAGIC</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_fire"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="seconds"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
